title: Hour 3 - Kirk Ferentz (05-07-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Kirk Ferentz (05-07-20)
description:
Kirk Ferentz; the Iowa Football Head Coach gives Dan his opinion of when college football will start again. Coach Ferentz says he is expecting fans and students will be in the stands.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
